page.title: 12HOME LIFE:BAD'HAM/DENNINGTON
page.content: 93% of households of more than 1 person sit down to a family meal at least once a day. Twice a week Meals on Meals are cooked at Dennington Primary school during term time & by voluntary cooks in the holidays. Distribution is by volunteers. Only 1 man (aged 97) has Meals on Wheels & he also has a home help. Other recipients live outside the block. 63% of households have immediate family living within a 20 mile radius. In Dennington almost as many households have their immediate family living within 20 miles as those who have family in the 20 to l00 mile radius. In Badingham the ratio is 1:1.4. 33% of all households have family outside the radius of 100 miles & 17% of households have family living abroad.
